zh.title: 守望先锋队友匹配
zh.checkNetworkOrRefresh: 请检查网络连接或刷新页面重试
zh.numberDescription: 数字部分通常是3-7位数字，可在战网客户端或游戏内查看
zh.stayOnPageNotice: 离开页面将自动退出匹配，请保持页面开启直到匹配完成
zh.inputCompleteHint: 输入完成后点击"开始匹配"按钮或按回车键
zh.autoCreateRoom: 系统会自动创建新房间
zh.countdownToStart: 倒计时 {seconds} 秒后开始游戏
zh.gameStarted: 游戏开始！祝您游戏愉快！
zh.roomFullMessage: 房间已满！如果你们已经成功配对，请点击下方按钮
zh.matchedSuccessHint: 提示：只有在确认配对成功后才点击此按钮
zh.importantStatementContent: 本队友匹配系统仅为完成游戏内紫色战利品箱任务而设计，专门用于满足游戏任务要求的组队需求。
zh.usageScopeContent: 本系统不适用于其他类型的匹配需求，包括但不限于竞技排位、娱乐模式、自定义游戏等其他游戏内容的组队。
zh.civilizedGamingContent: 请遵守游戏规则，保持良好的游戏环境，尊重其他玩家，文明交流，共同营造健康的游戏氛围。
zh.prohibitedBehaviorContent: 严禁利用本系统进行任何违规行为，包括但不限于恶意刷分、代练、外挂使用等违反游戏服务条款的行为。
zh.taskCompletionContent: 匹配成功后，请按照游戏要求完成相应任务，获得紫色战利品箱奖励。任务完成后建议及时解散队伍。
zh.agreeTerms: 我已阅读并同意以上使用条款
zh.thankYouMessage: 感谢使用守望先锋队友匹配系统
zh.autoReturnMessage: 页面将在几秒后自动返回房间列表
zh.opponentLeft: 对方已离开，继续等待新玩家加入...
zh.countdownAutoClean: 倒计时结束后将自动清空房间
zh.selectRoomToStart: 选择一个房间开始匹配
zh.successJoinedRoom: 您已成功加入房间，等待匹配

en.title: Overwatch Teammate Matching
en.checkNetworkOrRefresh: Please check your network connection or refresh the page
en.numberDescription: Number part is usually 3-7 digits, can be found in Battle.net client or in-game
en.stayOnPageNotice: Leaving this page will automatically exit matching, please keep the page open until matching is complete
en.battleTagPlaceholder: Please enter your Battle Tag, e.g.: Player#12345
en.inputCompleteHint: Click "Start Matching" button or press Enter after input
en.autoCreateRoom: System will automatically create new rooms
en.waitingForPlayers: Waiting for other players to join...
en.roomFullMessage: Room is full! If you have successfully matched, please click the button below
en.matchedSuccessHint: Hint: Only click this button after confirming successful matching
en.importantStatementContent: This teammate matching system is designed solely for completing purple loot box tasks in the game, specifically to meet the team requirements for game tasks.
en.usageScopeContent: This system is not applicable to other types of matching needs, including but not limited to competitive ranking, arcade modes, custom games, and other in-game content teaming.
en.civilizedGamingContent: Please follow game rules, maintain a good gaming environment, respect other players, communicate civilly, and work together to create a healthy gaming atmosphere.
en.prohibitedBehaviorContent: It is strictly prohibited to use this system for any violations, including but not limited to malicious boosting, account leveling, cheating, and other behaviors that violate the game's terms of service.
en.taskCompletionContent: After successful matching, please complete the corresponding tasks according to game requirements to obtain purple loot box rewards. It is recommended to disband the team promptly after task completion.
en.agreeTerms: I have read and agree to the above terms of use
en.thankYouMessage: Thank you for using the Overwatch Teammate Matching System
en.autoReturnMessage: Page will automatically return to room list in a few seconds
en.opponentLeft: Opponent left, waiting for new player to join...
en.waitingSecondPlayerJoin: Waiting for second player to join...
en.countdownAutoClean: Room will be automatically cleared after countdown
en.selectRoomToStart: Select a room to start matching
en.successJoinedRoom: Successfully joined room, waiting for match
